CHARACTER.name: Claire
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a woman with a strange looking sword)

LINE.text: I took a vacation only to arrive in a place with evil lurking underground. Worst vacation ever.
This guy, Cloud... I have a strange feeling, that I know him, but at the same time I'm sure I never met him before.
They say the Dungeon is magical - it's different every time you arrive in this village. Can you believe this?
Lightning? What about it?

CHARACTER.name: Cloud
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a man with very big and unpractical looking sword)

LINE.text: I wish Aerith could see this place... Without monsters and stuff below, of course. (sighs)
So, another one to venture into the Dungeon? Well, hope you'll be more successful than others.
No one knows how deep the Dungeon is. Nobody ever returned to tell the tale.
I try no to use my sword. Use brings about wear, tear, and rust â€” and that's a real waste.
Why I never went to the Dungeon myself? Because I'm on a vacation, that's why. Besides, I have my own damn problems in the City: drugs, organized crime and meager salaries.
No, I don't know Claire. I was surprised myself, when I learned that she is a Soldier as well. And on a vacation too! What a silly coincedence...

CHARACTER.name: Phoenix
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a nobleman with spiky hair)

LINE.text: Miles may act as if he doesn't know me, but we actually studied law together at Royal Academy. Believe it or not, but he wanted to be a defense attorney. I wonder what changed him...
I've been to the village before. But never to the classic one.

Look, it's my attorney's badge!
(shows you round shaped gold plated badge with Scales of Justice engraved on it)

CHARACTER.name: Miles
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a collected nobleman in fancy clothes)

JOB.text: I'm the Chief Prosecutor of this province.

LINE.text: They sent me here to maintain order and, as ill luck would have it, this excuse for a lawyer, Phoenix, arrives as well! As if we don't have enough problems already.
If you want something done, hire a bounty hunter. Oh, wait, that's not my line... And not from here either!
To be or not to be? What kind of strange question is that?

CHARACTER.name: Ian
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a man wearing a mask)

LINE.text: The Great Eye is watching you.
We are Anonymous, we never forget and never forgive.
You know, for some reason this whole world seems familiar... I feel an URGE to go punch some tree.

CHARACTER.name: Garrett
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a hooded man with artificial eye)

JOB.text: I used to relieve people of unnecessary things.

LINE.text:
"What is locked... can be opened... What is hidden... can be found... What is yours... ...can be mine."
Yeah, I used to say that. :-)
It seems I'll never get accustomed to daylight.
I wanted to settle down at last, so I thought this would be the perfect place, but...

CHARACTER.name: Tigra
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a girl in a catlike costume)

NAME.text: I'm Tigra, nice to meet you!

LINE.text: You wanted to ask me something? Mind you, I don't give advices for free - only meat pieces are accepted! ;-)
Welcome to our village! Wish you could see it at better times, though...
The Dungeon? Oh, it used to be a mine, actually, but then it became too dangerous and deadly, so people started to call it - "The Dungeon".
No one knows why evil appeared in the Dungeon. People say that there's been some iniquity down there, a miner was killed in a dispute... And now he is seeking revenge on us for abandoning him. Scary!
My parents are... not around anymore. Our priest was kind enough to adopt me, so I'm staying at the chapel now.

CHARACTER.name: Steve
CHARACTER.hailString: (you see a blocky man carrying a pickaxe)

LINE.text: They say that sometimes a ghost of a miner may suddenly appear in the Dungeon. People say his name was Herobrine and he tragically died in the mines.
Emeralds are green, diamonds are blue, Redstone is red and this is all true!
What do you mean, I am blocky? Look who's talking!

Business has been pretty much frozen since these events started. I'm thinking of going to the City for earnings. I wonder why they never bothered to send some guards or soldiers or someone here to look into our situation.
Have you seen this guy with a sword? I mean, isn't it a bit, like, overkill?...
♪ Far over the misty mountains cold ♪ ♪ To dungeons deep, and caverns old ♪ ♪ We must away, ere break of day ♪ ♪ To seek the pale, enchanted gold... ♪
♪ Under the Mountain dark and tall ♪ ♪ The King has come unto his hall! ♪ ♪ His foe is dead, the Worm of Dread, ♪ ♪ And ever so his foes shall fall... ♪
♪ From the red sky of the East ♪ ♪ To the sunset in the West ♪ ♪ We have cheated Death ♪ ♪ And he has cheated us... ♪
♪ The forest raised a Christmas tree, ♪ ♪ 'Twas silent and serene. ♪ ♪ In winter and in summer it was ♪ ♪ Slender and so green... ♪

CHARACTER.hailString: (this man has a strange aura about him)

JOB.text: You can say I am an overseer.

LINE.text: Best of luck, player.
Don't get discouraged if you die a few times. It's an integral part of the whole process.
Learning through trial is essential. But don't forget about your sense of reason.
Never start a fight that you cannot finish.
